Text:

Can I "produce" a PDF with AcroX?  I briefly tried some weeks ago and failed.  I quickly concluded that the text file that redirects the program back in on itself hinders my ability to produce pdfs.  Any thoughts or suggestions to remedy this?

@some-young-guy: 
if you tried with this version: thepiratebay.org/torrent/6179036, then you are using what I am using and it works perfectly. Rip it out, do a search and destroy for all things Acrobat and Reader (don't forget hidden files), run a registry cleaner (hell, run two of them!), reboot, and follow this guy's instructions to the letter.

@devrindare: http://www.microsoft.com/windows/windows-7/compare/default.aspx

try Google next time. I'll be you'll find it handy, nifty, and easy too.
